评论详情: The material is very soft, which is a hit or miss with lace, so I was pleased that it was soft. I got it while it was on sale for $6.99 and it says the regular price is $19.99. I definitely do not think this product is worth $20. No way. I wouldn't spend more than $10 for this, so buyer beware if you're seeing this review when the item isn't for sale (unless they're just making a fake full price to make you think you're getting a deal - which Amazon does do). It does look nice and flattering once the straps and everything are adjusted to my body, so it's nice that it has adjustable straps for the shoulders and for the leg garters. The leg garters are a must in order to keep the bodice looking nice. One thing this is missing (which I should have double checked before ordering) is adjustable hooks for the back. Having a smooth back is a benefit if you're going to sleep in it but I wouldn't sleep in underwire. Plus, I expect it stretches out over time and having an adjustable back helps a product last longer since you can make it tighter as it stretches out.
